short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add hilarious graphical overlays to existing web photos.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Doctor Photo allows you to import any photo on the web and drag and drop various graphic overlays such as mustaches, halos, horns, etc. to adorn the photo.  Use any public photos from SkyDrive, Facebook, Dropbox, or any valid public jpg, png or gif image on the web.  Saving is limited, but right now you can screen capture if you like, and share away.
